name: Building and Navmesh unit movement Test.
name_original: Building and Navmesh unit movement Test.
description:
R - Rotate Buildings.  F - Spawn House.  WASD - Move Camera. Mouse3 - Rotate Cam

This can be played in the browser but it looks terrible and is quite buggy, I recommend downloading it.

This was made a long time ago as a small test. It is overflowing with bugs but I decided as I have realised a lot that I could have improved since making it, instead I will upload it and then start fresh. This time I am trying to implement the buildings and units on to a procedural generated low poly terrain.
